title: Ban and pick phase lag
body: so when i'm in the picked and banning phase in a ranked or normal game, I tend to get a lot of lag. The lag i get is mostly delays. Example: lets say someone was banning syndra, i would have to wait about 3 seconds after they banned, for me to see they actually banned the person. Does anyone know if there is a solution.

replies.body:
Are you running fairly *low-end* hardware? Some players on lower-spec machines will see performance issues in the Beta Client. A common workaround to this is to hop into your client's settings (cog icon, top-right) to enable *Low spec mode* and to disable *animation*. I've provided a screenshot of what those configurations look like:

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

If this didn't cause a change for you, let me know.
